body_html:
Cool. Thanks for the extended explanation @fmassa - can you extrapolate a little more on the "gaps in indices" part of the code: https://gist.github.com/fmassa/f8158d1dfd25a8047c2c668a44ff57f4#file-pytorch_advanced_indexing-py-L34

The explanation for combining advanced and basic indexing in the numpy documentation leaves a lot to be desired :)
